ProductUsageResource.name: ProductUsageResource
ProductUsageResource.description: Represents the mapping of a product and its usage resources.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date and time when the relationship between the product and the usage resource stops being active, and any usage tracking or billing related to this relationship ends.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date and time when the relationship between the product and the usage resource becomes active or effective, and any usage tracking or billing related to this relationship begins.

IsOptional.description: Indicates whether the product usage resource is optional when the associated product is one of the commitment usage model types (true) or not (false). The default value is false. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the product usage grant.

ProductId.description: The sellable product that grants the usage resource.

ProductUsageResourceNum.description: The number of each resource grant map that starts with one and is consecutive.

Status.description: The status of the product usage resource record.

TokenResourceId.description: The usage resource of category Token thatâ€™s associated with the selected usage resource. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource associated with the product usage grant.
